model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Parent, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I think working at the zoo so long has helped. Why did you leave your last job. Was that the one you were working in the warehouse? Sorry to hear about your dogs, it can be hard managing older animals.

[MEMORY]
1. Speaker A mentions having dogs and Speaker B admires them for their peaceful nature.
2. Speaker B has elderly terriers and is planning to leave their part-time job for a break before starting a new one.
3. Speaker A has a pet raccoon named Journey and a bearded dragon named Sid.
4. Speaker A works at a zoo and is willing to help Speaker B get an entry-level position there.
5. Speaker A mentions that entry-level positions at the zoo involve cleaning enclosures and feeding less dangerous animals but offer decent pay, training, benefits, and assistance with schooling.
6. Speaker A works at a zoo and has tried playing music for the white tigers and home concerts for their pets.
current_dialogue: Speaker A: I think working at the zoo so long has helped. Why did you leave your last job. Was that the one you were working in the warehouse? Sorry to hear about your dogs, it can be hard managing older animals.

raw_prediction: Yes, it was the warehouse job. I just felt like I needed a change of pace before starting something new. And yes, caring for elderly pets definitely requires more time and attention. How did you end up working at the zoo in the first place?
